senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>сжить</w>.

examples.text: Злой отчим, <w>сживший</w> пасынка из дома, в итоге остался совсем один.

target_lang_translations.en: The evil stepfather, who had <w>driven</w> his stepson out of the house, eventually ended up all alone.

examples.text: Сосед, <w>сживший</w> нас со свету своими постоянными жалобами, наконец-то переехал.

target_lang_translations.en: The neighbor, who had <w>hounded</w> us to death with his constant complaints, finally moved away.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'to drive out' or 'to hound', referring to someone who has forced another person to leave a place or made their life unbearable.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: forcing someone to leave a place
making someone's life unbearable, often used in idioms
